definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: We climbed up the hill to overlook the surrounding wonderful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 我們登上山，俯瞰周圍的勝景。

sentences.english: The world-famous Stone Forest lies within Lunan County.
sentences.chinese: 舉世聞名的石林勝景位於路南縣境內。

sentences.english: Children playing in seasonal rains are a great sight of monsoon and six seasons here in Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在季雨中的玩耍是雨季中的一道勝景。

sentences.english: The Tower of London is one of the city's chief tourist attractions.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦塔是該城市主要旅遊勝景之一。

sentences.english: The Chinese beautiful scenery are countless, old name Sichuan twofold day.
sentences.chinese: 中華勝景數不盡，中原名川兩重天。

sentences.english: With clear water and willow trees along the bank, it is the most popular tourist scenic spot with residents of Qingzhou.
sentences.chinese: 碧波粼粼，堤柳成蔭，是青州人喜愛的一處勝景。

sentences.english: Today the Great Wall has be a place of interest.
sentences.chinese: 今天，長城已經是一處勝景了。

sentences.english: However, now Thailand is using water lanterns to create a tourist attraction.
sentences.chinese: 不過現在泰國卻以水燈締造觀光勝景。

definition: Shuangxi or Shuanghsi township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
a place famous for its scenery or historical relics/scenic spot/CL:處|处[chu4]
to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu
